tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adventure_equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment ( 
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    item_name VARCHAR(255), 
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50), 
    quantity INT, 
    maintenance_records TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE Adventure_Equipment (
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    equipment_category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity_in_stock INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Usage_Log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES Adventure_Equipment(equipment_id),
    user_id INT,
    date_used DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Maintenance_Log (
    maintenance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES Adventure_Equipment(equipment_id),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Adventure_Equipment (
	item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_name VARCHAR,
	item_category VARCHAR,
	quantity INT,
	available BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Inventory (
	inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	item_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	last_maintenance_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES Adventure_Equipment(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	inventory_id INT,
	maintenance_description TEXT,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (inventory_id) REFERENCES Equipment_Inventory(inventory_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdventureEquipments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  maintenance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentCategories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentLocations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentTransactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  equipment_id INT,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_quantity INT
)
